title: Data Source
description: A data source for use with ink-id

schema_version.description: The version of the dataSource schema this file was made to fulfill

type.description: The kind of data source (region or volume)

volume.description: Volume path relative to this data source file

ppm.description: PPM path relative to this data source file

mask.description: PPM mask image path relative to this data source file

invert_normals.description: Whether to invert the normals from this region before sampling subvolumes

bounding_box.description: bounding box array [left, top, right, bottom], or null (indicating region occupies entire PPM bounds)

volume_bounding_box.description: bounding box array [min_x, min_y, min_z, max_x, max_y, max_z], or null (indicating volume occupies entire volume bounds). only applicable for volume data sources.

ink_label.description: Ink label image path relative to this data source file

rgb_label.description: RGB label image path relative to this data source file

volcart_texture_label.description: Volume Cartographer texture label image path relative to this data source file
